text:
Regarding the October 16th update to access of files uploaded through forms: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/upcoming-forms-file-upload-access>

We have a system that automatically downloads and then deletes these files but it no longer works. How do we pass authentication?

Hi Bradon,

I would suggest subscribing to this thread in the forums.

As Matt states we hear you and are actively investigating workarounds. 

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Upcoming-New-restrictions-on-Forms-File-upload-access/m-p/298231/highlight/true#M28019>

Hey Jon, thanks for the link. I am following the thread.

There’s nothing concrete in the thread. Am I to assume that authentication isn’t currently possible?

Thanks again.

Your situation seems to be different from the others and you may be able to use the api with auth in your case. 

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/overview#authentication>

I think you can use this API to get the file in your case
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/files/get_files>
We tried with the API key but are getting a 403.

hmm. I will talk with some people more familiar with the API’s about your situation. In the mean time that forum thread will generally have the most current information related to the change and any work-arounds or solutions that may exist..
